title: Metallica St. Anger Live in Studio (FLAC)
description:
The audio portion of the St. Anger bonus "live in studio" dvd.

Here's what I did. First, I pulled all the 5.1 audio off and coverted it to 2.0 16/44.1. I used the 5.1 because the sample rate was higher than the stereo. 

After it was in stereo I removed all the chatter and noise from between songs, added 1 sec of silence and fade to the begining and end of each track (not affecting the music at all) so that the editing between tracks would not be noticible. I then increased the track volume to 0dB (the loudest a CD can reproduce without creating noise or clipping) and then converted to FLAC.

The result, if you burn to CD, is a perfect, live representation of St. Anger.

Enjoy.
